item.title: “UsaKawaii Yuzuki Yukari” Official LINE stickers by Agetawashi Now on Sale!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
VOCALOMAKETS has announced that an adorable set of Yuzuki Yukari LINE stickers will be added to their already existing ones! Let’s check them together! The stickers have been illustrated by Agetawashi and feature our favorite little vocalist in various cute expressions and poses, to suit all occasions. 揚げたわしさんによる結月ゆかりLINEスタンプ「ウザかわいい結月ゆかりスタンプ」が発売になりました！独特な雰囲気のウザかわいい結月ゆかりLINEスタンプとなっております！詳細：https://t.co/cputIWo3kK pic.twitter.com/u0yFbgapO1 — VOCALOMAKETS (@VOCALOMAKETS) September 13, 2019 …

The post “UsaKawaii Yuzuki Yukari” Official LINE stickers by Agetawashi Now on Sale! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
VOCALOMAKETS has announced that an adorable set of Yuzuki Yukari LINE stickers will be added to their already existing ones! Let’s check them together!

The stickers have been illustrated by Agetawashi and feature our favorite little vocalist in various cute expressions and poses, to suit all occasions.

揚げたわしさんによる結月ゆかりLINEスタンプ「ウザかわいい結月ゆかりスタンプ」が発売になりました！
独特な雰囲気のウザかわいい結月ゆかりLINEスタンプとなっております！
詳細：https://t.co/cputIWo3kK pic.twitter.com/u0yFbgapO1

— VOCALOMAKETS (@VOCALOMAKETS) September 13, 2019

There are 39 stickers portraying Yukari in the pack, in addition of a special one featuring Kizuna Akari instead! This set is currently on sale for 120 JPY instead of its standard price of 240 JPY, so it’s a good time to purchase it!

You can buy it here.

Please note that the stickers can only be purchased in the following 25 countries: Argentina, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Denmark, United Kingdom, Finland, France, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Japan, Luxembourg, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, Thailand, Netherlands, Uruguay, United States

Source

If you would like to see more LINE sticker packs from VOCALOMAKETS, check out their LINE store page here or our previous reports on their other sticker set!

Moyashi-shiyamo’s Yuzuki Yukari Lin&Onn Stickers!
Taneko’s Kizuna Akari LINE Stickers
Taneko’s “Daily Yuzuki Yukari” LINE Stickers
Nejishiki and Danjyo SorN’s Yuzuki Yukari LINE Stickers
ebi_gohan’s Yuzuki Yukari LINE Stickers

Keep following us on VNN for more exciting news!

item.title: Check out VOCALOMAKETS’ new Yuzuki Yukari Lin&Onn LINE Stickers!

item.description:

Drawn by the talented moyashi-shiyamo, this sticker set portrays Yukari in her two additional appearances, making a perfect match of power and …

The post Check out VOCALOMAKETS’ new Yuzuki Yukari Lin&Onn LINE Stickers! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It is time for some new LINE Stickers from VOCALOMAKETS, and seems we got a set revolving around Yuzuki Yukari‘s two designs Lin and Onn today!

Power and Sweetness Join Your LINE Stickers!

Drawn by the talented moyashi-shiyamo, this sticker set portrays Yukari in her two additional appearances, making a perfect match of power and sweetness than fits almost every conversation!

結月ゆかり穏・凛LINEスタンプが発売開始！
もやししゃもさんのイラストによるとってもかわいい結月ゆかり穏・凛スタンプが完成しました！
詳細：https://t.co/HSWnrFKhjU pic.twitter.com/7Y5l5dQBsq

— VOCALOMAKETS (@VOCALOMAKETS) August 18, 2019

Priced 1,99 USD and with a total of 40 different stickers for you to enjoy, this set will make a perfect addition for your conversations with your friends, and will fill them with adorableness!

Are you interested perhaps? If so, you can find them here!

In Need of More Stickers from VOCALOMAKETS?

Then look no more! Below you can find the list pointing to each set we covered! Enjoy!

Taneko’s Kizuna Akari LINE Stickers
Taneko’s “Daily Yuzuki Yukari” LINE Stickers
Nejishiki and Danjyo SorN’s Yuzuki Yukari LINE Stickers
ebi_gohan’s Yuzuki Yukari LINE Stickers

item.title: Yukari’s Voice Provider announces Chihilab and New Songs!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
Yuzuki Yukari‘s voice provider, Chihiro Ishiguro, has created her own company called Chihilab! She has already released two songs, ‘Kirakira ☆ jump’ and ‘I hate you’, which are both duets between her and Yukari. Kirakira ☆ jump is the first original song on Chihilab! It has an upbeat, energetic feel to it. The song was composed by …

The post Yukari’s Voice Provider announces Chihilab and New Songs! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Yuzuki Yukari‘s voice provider, Chihiro Ishiguro, has created her own company called Chihilab! She has already released two songs, ‘Kirakira ☆ jump’ and ‘I hate you’, which are both duets between her and Yukari.

Kirakira ☆ jump is the first original song on Chihilab! It has an upbeat, energetic feel to it. The song was composed by ChomP, illustrated by HiroakiWatanabe and the video was edited by Suzuki Kanibi.

Watch the cute and colourful music video on YouTube below!

In contrast, ‘I hate you’ is a grittier song with an attitude and cool a edge to it. This song was composed by Takahisa Okubo, who also edited the video and the illustrations were drawn by zoruboi.

Check out the cool music video below!

Source

We look forward to seeing what the future holds for Chihilab!

For now, if you would like more information on Chihilab or simply want to follow Chihiro’s work, check out the links below.

Follow VOCALOMAKETS on their Official Website, Blog and Twitter
Don’t forget to also follow AHS Software in their Facebook page, Twitter, Youtube and official website
Chihiro Ishiguro’s Twitter
Chihilab Official Website

The post Yukari’s Voice Provider announces Chihilab and New Songs! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Official “Yuzuki Yukari Daily Stickers” LINE Sticker Set Available!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
VOCALOMAKETS is adding more and more LINE sticker sets for us to enjoy and, after two adorable and successful ones that we covered previously, today we get to see a new cutesy set! A Daily Life with Yukari! This time the theme those stickers are based off is a daily feelings routine, and is perfectly …

The post New Official “Yuzuki Yukari Daily Stickers” LINE Sticker Set Available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
VOCALOMAKETS is adding more and more LINE sticker sets for us to enjoy and, after two adorable and successful ones that we covered previously, today we get to see a new cutesy set!

A Daily Life with Yukari!

This time the theme those stickers are based off is a daily feelings routine, and is perfectly portrayed by Taneko Wa‘s cute Yuzuki Yukari chibis!

たねこ・ワ・さんによる結月ゆかりLINEスタンプ「結月ゆかり（たねこ・ワ・ver.）」が発売になりました！
日常で使えるかわいらしい結月ゆかりLINEスタンプとなっております！
詳細：https://t.co/LKVaYQPSWK pic.twitter.com/EsX9tDgcPz

— VOCALOMAKETS (@VOCALOMAKETS) July 1, 2019

In this set, priced 1,99 USD, you will enjoy the usage of an adorable Yukarin in most of our typical daily feelings! There is no better way to express yourself than using such an expressive character as her!

I know the screenshot shows Euros, but the price is the same in USD!

Isn’t she adorable? I bet you cannot resist to her cute little attire!

If you are interested in them, you can find them here!

Stay tuned with us on VNN for some more amazing news and cutesy content!

Follow VOCALOMAKETS on their Official Website, Blog and Twitter
Don’t forget to also follow AHS Software in their Facebook page, Twitter, Youtube and official website
Press release in Vocalomakets’s blog

 

The post New Official “Yuzuki Yukari Daily Stickers” LINE Sticker Set Available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Official Yuzuki Yukari LINE Stickers from Nejishiki and Danjyo Sora Available!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Yuzuki Yukari is surely receiving so many new expressive content lately and, after the previous LINE stickers from ebi_gohan we covered not long ago, we have a whole new set made by Nejishiki and Danjyo Sora! Lovers and Friends? Portraying an adorable and shy Yukari on the verge of finding love and confessing her feelings, …

The post New Official Yuzuki Yukari LINE Stickers from Nejishiki and Danjyo Sora Available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Yuzuki Yukari is surely receiving so many new expressive content lately and, after the previous LINE stickers from ebi_gohan we covered not long ago, we have a whole new set made by Nejishiki and Danjyo Sora!

Lovers and Friends?

Portraying an adorable and shy Yukari on the verge of finding love and confessing her feelings, those stickers st titled “Koibitomodachi” (a word playing around “Koibito” and “Tomodachi“, respectively “Lover” and “Friend“) will light up your conversations with all of your friends and possible crushes!

ねじ式さんと檀上大空さんのコラボによる結月ゆかりLINEスタンプ『「コイビトモダチ」なねじそらスタンプ』が発売になりました！
ちょっとヤンデレなかわいい結月ゆかりLINEスタンプとなっております！
詳細：https://t.co/y878Elhg1f pic.twitter.com/oYVMrPHFKZ

— VOCALOMAKETS (@VOCALOMAKETS) June 25, 2019

You can buy this set for 1,99 EUR (which should be 1,99 USD once converted, depending on the country you live) by simply clicking here!

Your conversations will get as adorable and cut as Yukari’s expressions goes, trust us!

Stay tuned with us on VNN for more amazing news and cutesy content like those stickers!

Follow VOCALOMAKETS on their Official Website, Blog and Twitter
Don’t forget to also follow AHS Software in their Facebook page, Twitter, Youtube and official website
Press release in Vocalomakets’s blog

The post New Official Yuzuki Yukari LINE Stickers from Nejishiki and Danjyo Sora Available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New VOCALOMAKETS Official LINE Stickers of Yuzuki Yukari by ebi_gohan Available!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
A new adorable set of stickers for LINE have been published by VOCALOMAKETS, this time featuring a cutesy Yuzuki Yukari illustrated by ebi_gohan!   Express yourself with this adorable set of 40 sticker featuring Yuzuki Yukari! You will be able to show how your feel at your best when chatting via LINE messenger, and they’re …

The post New VOCALOMAKETS Official LINE Stickers of Yuzuki Yukari by ebi_gohan Available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new adorable set of stickers for LINE have been published by VOCALOMAKETS, this time featuring a cutesy Yuzuki Yukari illustrated by ebi_gohan!

 

Express yourself with this adorable set of 40 sticker featuring Yuzuki Yukari! You will be able to show how your feel at your best when chatting via LINE messenger, and they’re really so cute after all!

They are priced 0,99 EUR (which should be 0,99 USD as well, but it changes based off of the country you live), and you can find them here!

Are you going to use them perhaps? We’re sure you will love them as much as we do!

Stay tuned with us on VNN for more amazing news!

Follow VOCALOMAKETS on their Official Website, Blog and Twitter
Don’t forget to also follow AHS Software in their Facebook page, Twitter, Youtube and official website
Press release in Vocalomakets’s blog

The post New VOCALOMAKETS Official LINE Stickers of Yuzuki Yukari by ebi_gohan Available! appeared first on VNN.
